title: Streaming PCDs
description: Definition of the batch PCDs data

is_pcd.description: Flag true if is potential conflict

date_ownship.description: Datetime of last position message received from ownship

lat_deg_ownship.description: Latitude in degrees from last position received from ownship

lon_deg_ownship.description: Longitude in degrees from last position received from ownship

proj_date_ownship.description: Datetime at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

proj_lat_deg_ownship.description: Latitude at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

proj_lon_deg_ownship.description: Longitude at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

date_intruder.description: Datetime at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

lat_deg_intruder.description: Latitude at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

lon_deg_intruder.description: Longitude at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

proj_date_intruder.description: Datetime at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

proj_lat_deg_intruder.description: Latitude at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

proj_lon_deg_intruder.description: Longitude at 6 seconds projection in order to facilitate interpolations

ref_epoch.description: Oldest datime from pair of flights for delay metrics

current_epoch.description: Most recent datetime from the pair of flights

current_distance_nm.description: Distance between the pair measured at current datetime

cpa_ownship_lat_deg.description: Latitude in degrees of the CPA for the ownship

cpa_ownship_lon_deg.description: Longitude in degrees of the CPA for the ownship

cpa_intruder_lat_deg.description: Longitude in degrees of the CPA for the ownship

cpa_intruder_lon_deg.description: Longitude in degrees of the CPA for the ownship

is_ownship_first.description: Flag indicating which aircraft is crossing first

month.description: Month as number, extracted from date, used as partition column

day.description: Day extracted from date, used as partition column

hour.description: Hour extracted from date, used as partition column
